title: You Touched My Heart
overview: Anyamani is a beautiful girl brought up in a family where only men are respected, which makes her proud of what she has, because she got it so hard. She meets Kuakhun, a man who warms both soul and heart, and is ready to give a warm light to a woman who is like a diamond, but love life is not so simple.When the business problems of the two families arise, including the death of Anyamani's brother, Kuakhun becomes her first suspect due to his past relationship with her sister-in-law, which ended long ago and returned again. Will trust prevail in this situation?
